text.div:
Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

CodeURITypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
v2-concCommenthttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-concCommentstringV2 Concept Comment
v2-concCommentAsPubhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-concCommentAsPubstringV2 Concept Comment As Published

Concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0201 defines the following codes in a Is-A heirarchy:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As PublishedDeutsch (German, de)
PRN Primary Residence NumberPrimary Residence NumberHauptwohnsitznummer
ORN Other Residence NumberOther Residence NumberNebenwohnsitznummer
WPN Work NumberWork NumberDienstnummer
VHN Vacation Home NumberVacation Home NumberFerienwohnsitznummer
ASN Answering Service NumberAnswering Service NumberAuftragsdienst
EMR Emergency NumberEmergency NumberNotfallnummer
NET Network (email) AddressNetwork (email) AddressRetained for backward compatibility as of v 2.6Retained for backward compatibility as of v 2.6Netzwerkadresse (E-Mail)
BPN Beeper NumberBeeper NumberRetained for backward compatibility as of v 2.6Retained for backward compatibility as of v 2.6Pagernummer (Cityruf o.ä.)
PRS PersonalPersonalNot tied to a location or roleNot tied to a location or role
DSM Direct Secure MessagingDirect Secure Messaging using the Direct Protocol

name: TelecommunicationUse
title: telecommunicationUse
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts for specifying a specific use of a telecommunication number.  Best practice is to use this concept whenever a telecommunication number or access string is specified.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the XTN segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0201 (Telecommunication Use Code)
